title: Recommender Systems 101
text: This article serves a dual purpose: it is both a collection of my personal learning notes and a comprehensive introduction to recommender systems for those interested in exploring the field. Whether youâ€™re just starting out or aiming to deepen your understanding, this guide designed to provide clear, intuitive explanations of key concepts for high-level understanding, along with technical details of popular methods used in the industry.

title: Rafi Mikail
